deleteConversationConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation?
welcomeSubtitle: Your AI-powered pair programmer. How can I help you today?
examplePrompts: Create a simple to-do list app with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Create a simple landing page using React with responsive design
Write a Pascal program to sort an array for beginners
Generate a Python script to analyze CSV data
loadingMessages: Give me a moment, processing your request...
Just a sec, analyzing your question...
Hmm, let me figure this out...
Hang tight, this won't take long...
generalNickname: What should the AI call you?
generalPreferences: What personal preferences should the AI consider in responses?
generalPreferencesPlaceholder: e.g., when learning new concepts, I find analogies particularly helpful
accountDescription: Manage your account settings and view profile information.
storageDescription: This will permanently delete all your conversation history from this browser.
deleteAllConversationsConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all conversations? This action cannot be undone.
languageDescription: Choose the language for the application interface.
aboutDescription: A modern, responsive chat interface designed for coding discussions. Powered by typescript webhooks for a smooth, interactive experience. It features a dark theme, clean code block highlighting, and a simple, user-friendly design inspired by today's AI tools.
deleteSingleConversationDescription: This will permanently delete this conversation.
editingNote: Editing message â€” only 1 message can be edited at a time.
clickToRun: Click "Run Code" to execute the program
programSuccess: Program executed successfully with no output.
enterInput: Enter input here (one value per line)...
inputHint: Tip: For multiple inputs, enter each value on a new line
inputInstruction: Enter ALL inputs your program needs below. The program will read them sequentially when it runs.
inputTip1: For multiple inputs, put each value on a new line
inputTip2: For scanf("%d %d") or similar, you can use: "5 10" or separate lines
inputTip3: The program will read inputs in the order you provide them
thisCodeNeedsInput: This code requires input. Click "Show Input" to provide input data.
enterInputsAndRun: Enter your inputs above, then click "Run Code"
languageNotSupported: Language "{{language}}" is not supported for execution
inputExampleC:
Example for scanf("%d %d", &a, &b):
5 10

Or one per line:
5
10
inputExampleCpp:
Example for cin >> a >> b:
5 10

Or one per line:
5
10
inputExamplePython:
Example for input():
John
25
New York
updateCanvasDescription: Open code in a resizable canvas with live preview and code execution
updateCodeExecutionDescription: Run Python, C++, Java, JavaScript, and 10+ more languages directly in the browser
updateTableExportDescription: Download AI-generated tables directly to Excel files with one click
updateTip: Try asking me to create interactive code examples and open them in the canvas for a better experience!
heroSubtitle: The AI assistant for problem solvers. Write, debug, and learn with your intelligent coding companion.
signInOrSignUp: Sign in or create your account
byCreatingAccount: By continuing, you agree to our

featuresSubtitle: Powerful features to help you code smarter, not harder
feature1Description: Chat naturally about your code. Ask questions, get explanations, and solve problems together.
feature2Description: Run code in 10+ languages directly in your browser. See results instantly with live preview.
feature3Description: Get instant responses and compile code in milliseconds. No waiting, just building.
